languages.text: "Таково блистательное — и для кого-то судьбоносное — решение Звездного Сиятельства, дамы и господа! И наконец наступает час, которого вы все так ждали — финальная часть нашего... эм, финала. Великое пиршество!" {n}Толпа изнемогает от нетерпения. Набрав воздух в легкие, губернатор издает громкий клич:{/n} "Ласераксы! КУШАТЬ ПОДАНО!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Как ни в чем не бывало губернатор продолжает вещать:{/n} "Таково блистательное — и для кого-то судьбоносное — решение Его Сиятельства, дамы и господа! И наконец наступает час, которого вы все так ждали — финальная часть нашего... эм, финала. Великое пиршество!"

languages.text: "Such is {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness's brilliant decision, which for some may have been fateful indeed! And finally, the hour you have all been waiting for: the concluding part of our, uh, conclusion! The great feast!" {n}The crowd's patience has worn thin. Filling his lungs, the governor shouts out,{/n} "Laceraxes! DINNER IS SERVED!"
languages.original_text: "Таково блистательное — и для кого-то судьбоносное — решение Звездного Сиятельства, дамы и господа! И наконец наступает час, которого вы все так ждали — финальная часть нашего... эм, финала. Великое пиршество!" {n}Толпа изнемогает от нетерпения. Набрав воздух в легкие, губернатор издает громкий клич:{/n} "Ласераксы! КУШАТЬ ПОДАНО!"

traits.locale_text: "Such is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s brilliant decision, which for some may have been fateful indeed! And finally, the hour you have all been waiting for, the concluding part of our, uh, conclusion! Let the great feast begin!"

"Such is {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship}'s brilliant decision, which for some may have been fateful indeed! And finally, the hour you have all been waiting for, the concluding part of our, uh, conclusion! Let the great feast begin!"

And finally, the hour you have all been waiting for: the concluding part of our, uh, conclusion! The great feast!" {n}The crowd's patience has worn thin. Filling his lungs, the governor shouts out,{/n} "Laceraxes! DINNER IS SERVED!"

languages.text: “来自上界的大人做出了英明的决定！对某些人来说，这确实是命运的指引！终于，所有人期待已久的时刻终于来了！这场盛会最后的部分，呃，结尾部分来了！盛宴正式开始！”{n}观众们的耐心已经消磨殆尽。总督深吸了一口气，高声喊道。{/n}“所有异虎听好！晚餐已经准备好了！”
languages.original_text: "Such is {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness's brilliant decision, which for some may have been fateful indeed! And finally, the hour you have all been waiting for: the concluding part of our, uh, conclusion! The great feast!" {n}The crowd's patience has worn thin. Filling his lungs, the governor shouts out,{/n} "Laceraxes! DINNER IS SERVED!"

traits.locale_text: “来自上界的大人做出了英明的决定！对某些人来说，这确实是命运的指引！终于，所有人期待已久的时刻终于来了！这场盛会最后的部分，呃，结尾部分来了！盛宴正式开始！”{n}观众们的耐心已经消磨殆尽。总督深吸了一口气，高声喊道。{/n}“所有异虎听好！晚餐已经准备好了！”
“来自上界的大人做出了英明的决定！对某些人来说，这确实是命运的指引！终于，所有人期待已久的时刻终于来了！这场盛会最后的部分，呃，结尾部分来了！盛宴正式开始！”

languages.text: «¡Tal es la brillante decisión de Su Excelencia Celestial, que algunos quizá encuentren fatídica! Y ya para terminar, el momento que todos habéis estado esperando: la parte concluyente de nuestra... eh... ¡conclusión! ¡Que empiece el gran banquete!». {n}La paciencia de la muchedumbre se ha agotado. El gobernador, a pleno pulmón, proclama:{/n} «¡Lacerax! ¡A CENAR!».
languages.original_text: "Such is {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness's brilliant decision, which for some may have been fateful indeed! And finally, the hour you have all been waiting for: the concluding part of our, uh, conclusion! The great feast!" {n}The crowd's patience has worn thin. Filling his lungs, the governor shouts out,{/n} "Laceraxes! DINNER IS SERVED!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tal es la brillante decisión de Su Excelencia Celestial, que algunos quizá encuentren fatídica! Y ya para terminar, el momento que todos habéis estado esperando: la parte concluyente de nuestra... eh... ¡conclusión! ¡Que empiece el gran banquete!». {n}La paciencia de la muchedumbre se ha agotado. El gobernador, a pleno pulmón, proclama:{/n} «¡Lacerax! ¡A CENAR!».

languages.text: "Semavi Efendimizin öyle parlak kararları vardır ki kimisi, kaderi bile gerçekten değiştirebilir! Hepinizin beklediği an nihayet geldi. Sonucumuzun... Son sonuç bölümü! Büyük ziyafet başlasın!" {n}Kalabalığın sabrının tükendiği belli oluyor. Ciğerlerini havayla dolduran vali, yüksek sesle bağırıyor.{/n} "Laserakslar! YEMEK HAZIR!"
languages.original_text: "Such is {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness's brilliant decision, which for some may have been fateful indeed! And finally, the hour you have all been waiting for: the concluding part of our, uh, conclusion! The great feast!" {n}The crowd's patience has worn thin. Filling his lungs, the governor shouts out,{/n} "Laceraxes! DINNER IS SERVED!"

traits.locale_text: "Semavi Efendimizin öyle parlak kararları vardır ki kimisi, kaderi bile gerçekten değiştirebilir! Hepinizin beklediği an nihayet geldi. Sonucumuzun... Son sonuç bölümü! Büyük ziyafet başlasın!" {n}Kalabalığın sabrının tükendiği belli oluyor. Ciğerlerini havayla dolduran vali, yüksek sesle bağırıyor.{/n} "Laserakslar! YEMEK HAZIR!"
"Semavi Efendimizin öyle parlak kararları vardır ki kimisi, kaderi bile gerçekten değiştirebilir! Hepinizin beklediği an nihayet geldi. Sonucumuzun... Son sonuç bölümü! Büyük ziyafet başlasın!"

languages.text: 「このような天の閣下の素晴らしい決断は、ある者にとって本当に運命を分けるものです！そして、ついに、時間がやってきました。結果発表の時間です！盛大なる宴をお楽しみください！」{n}群衆の忍耐は限界に達している。総督は胸いっぱいに息を吸い込み、声を張り上げた。{/n}「ラセラックス！食事の時間だ！」
languages.original_text: "Such is {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness's brilliant decision, which for some may have been fateful indeed! And finally, the hour you have all been waiting for: the concluding part of our, uh, conclusion! The great feast!" {n}The crowd's patience has worn thin. Filling his lungs, the governor shouts out,{/n} "Laceraxes! DINNER IS SERVED!"

traits.locale_text: 「このような天の閣下の素晴らしい決断は、ある者にとって本当に運命を分けるものです！そして、ついに、時間がやってきました。結果発表の時間です！盛大なる宴をお楽しみください！」{n}群衆の忍耐は限界に達している。総督は胸いっぱいに息を吸い込み、声を張り上げた。{/n}「ラセラックス！食事の時間だ！」
「このような天の閣下の素晴らしい決断は、ある者にとって本当に運命を分けるものです！そして、ついに、時間がやってきました。結果発表の時間です！素晴らしい宴会を始めましょう！」

languages.text: « Telle est la décision de Son Altesse Célestissime ! Une décision que d'aucuns considéreraient comme fatidique ! Et enfin, le moment que vous attendiez tous : la conclusion de notre, euh, conclusion ! Le grand festin ! {n}La foule commence à perdre patience. Gonflant ses poumons, le gouverne s'exclame :{/n} « Lacérax ! LE DÎNER EST SERVI ! »
languages.original_text: "Such is {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness's brilliant decision, which for some may have been fateful indeed! And finally, the hour you have all been waiting for: the concluding part of our, uh, conclusion! The great feast!" {n}The crowd's patience has worn thin. Filling his lungs, the governor shouts out,{/n} "Laceraxes! DINNER IS SERVED!"

traits.locale_text: « Telle est la décision de Son Altesse Célestissime ! Une décision que d'aucuns considéreraient comme fatidique ! Et enfin, le moment que vous attendiez tous : la conclusion de notre, euh, conclusion ! Le grand festin ! {n}La foule commence à perdre patience. Gonflant ses poumons, le gouverne s'exclame :{/n} « Lacérax ! LE DÎNER EST SERVI ! »

languages.text: "Das ist die brillante Entscheidung {mf|Seiner|Ihrer} himmlischen Hoheit, die sich für einige als schicksalhaft erwiesen hat! Und schließlich die Stunde, auf die Ihr alle gewartet habt: der abschließende Teil unseres, äh, Abschlusses! Das große Festmahl!" {n}Die Geduld der Menge ist fast erschöpft. Der Gouverneur atmet tief ein und brüllt:{/n} "Laceraxe! DAS ESSEN IST SERVIERT!"
languages.original_text: "Such is {mf|His|Her} Celestial Highness's brilliant decision, which for some may have been fateful indeed! And finally, the hour you have all been waiting for: the concluding part of our, uh, conclusion! The great feast!" {n}The crowd's patience has worn thin. Filling his lungs, the governor shouts out,{/n} "Laceraxes! DINNER IS SERVED!"
